00008 void coupeEOF (const unsigned char *payload, const u_short mess_len, char* strg)
00009 {
00010         
00011         strncpy(strg,"",1);
00012         int i=0;
00013         int c=0;
00014         
00015   //assert(payload_len < 500);
00016         for(i = 0; i < (mess_len); i++)
00017         {
00018                 if(!(payload[i]=='\0')) {
00019                         strg[c] = payload[i];
00020                         c++;
00021                 }
00022         }
00023         strg[c] = '\0';
00024 }
00025 
00026 unsigned char *getPayload(const struct ip *iph)
00027 {
00028     unsigned char *payload = NULL;
00029     unsigned char *transport = (unsigned char *) iph + iph->ip_hl * 4;
00030     // if protocol is TCP
00031     if ((((int) iph->ip_p) == IPPROTO_TCP)) {
00032         struct tcphdr *tcph = (struct tcphdr *) transport;
00033         payload = transport + tcph->th_off * 4;
00034     }
00035     // if protocol is UDP
00036     else if ((((int) iph->ip_p) == IPPROTO_UDP)) {
00037         // udp has a fixed length of 8 bytes
00038         payload = transport + 8;
00039     }
00040     return payload;
00041 }
00042 
00043 unsigned short getPayloadLen(const struct ip *iph, u_short ipLen)
00044 {
00045     unsigned char *transport = (unsigned char *) iph + iph->ip_hl * 4;
00046     // if protocol is TCP
00047     if ((((int) iph->ip_p) == IPPROTO_TCP)) {
00048         struct tcphdr *tcph = (struct tcphdr *) transport;
00049         return (ipLen - (iph->ip_hl * 4) - (tcph->th_off * 4) );
00050     }
00051     // if protocol is UDP
00052     else if ((((int) iph->ip_p) == IPPROTO_UDP)) {
00053         // udp has a fixed length of 8 bytes
00054         return (ipLen - (iph->ip_hl * 4) - (2 * 4) );
00055     }
00056     return (ipLen - (iph->ip_hl * 4) );
00057     //return ipLen - (payload - ((unsigned char *) iph));
00058 }
00059 
00060 u_short getID(const struct ip *iph, u_short ipLen)
00061 {
00062     unsigned char *transp = (unsigned char *) iph + iph->ip_hl * 4;
00063     if ((((int) iph->ip_p) == IPPROTO_TCP)) {
00064         unsigned char *payload = getPayload(iph);
00065         u16 mess_len = getPayloadLen(iph, ipLen);
00066         struct tcphdr* temp = (struct tcphdr*) transp;
00067         if (mess_len == 0)
00068             return 3000;        //Nonpayload TCP traffic
00069         if (isHLCS(payload, mess_len))
00070                 return 403;
00071         if (isEdk(payload, mess_len))
00072                 return 106;             //eDonkey, eMule, Kademlia 52->106
00073         if (isEdk_all(payload, mess_len))
00074                 return 106;             //eDonkey, eMule, Kademlia Extended 52->106
00075         if (isBittorrent(payload, mess_len))
00076                 return 104;             //BitTorrent 54->104
00077         if (isKazaa(payload, mess_len))
00078                 return 107;             //Kazaa 51->107
00079         if (isKazaa_all(payload, mess_len))
00080                 return 107;             //Kazaa 51->107
00081         if (isGnu(payload, mess_len))
00082                 return 110;             //GNU 3 53->110
00083         if (isGnu_all(payload, mess_len))
00084                 return 110;             //GNU 3 53->110
00085         if (isSoul(payload, mess_len))
00086                 return 120;             //Soulseek 5 55->120
00087         if (isAres(payload, mess_len))
00088                 return 103;             //Ares 9  59->103
00089         if (isMute(payload, mess_len))
00090                 return 115;             //Mute 13    63->115
00091         if(isNap(payload, mess_len))
00092                 return 116;             //OpenNap 11    61->116
00093         if(isEarthS5(payload, mess_len))
00094                 return 124;             //EarthStation5 8       58->124
00095         if(isMP2P(payload, mess_len))
00096                 return 125;             //MP2P  10      60->125
00097         if (isXdcc(payload, mess_len))
00098                 return 128;             //Xdcc 14   64->128
00099         if (isDc(payload, mess_len))
00100                 return 105;             //DirectConnect  67->105
00101         if (isDc_all(payload, mess_len))
00102                 return 105;             //DirectConnect   67->105
00103         if (isApple(payload, mess_len))
00104                 return 102;             //AppleJuice 66->102
00105         if (isWaste(payload, mess_len))
00106                 return 129;             //Waste 65->129
00107         if (isMSN(payload, mess_len))
00108                 return 306;
00109         if (isHTTPQuicktime(payload, mess_len))
00110                 return 602;
00111         if (isHTTPVideo(payload, mess_len))
00112                 return 606;
00113         if (isHTTPAudio(payload, mess_len))
00114                 return 608;
00115         if (isHTTP(payload, mess_len))
00116                 return 201;
00117         if (isWinMX(payload, mess_len))
00118                 return 126;   //WinMX 62->126
00119         if (isSMTP(payload, mess_len))
00120                 return 704;
00121         if (isPOP3(payload, mess_len))
00122                 return 703;
00123         if (isIRC(payload, mess_len) && (ntohs(temp->th_sport) == 6667 || ntohs(temp->th_dport) == 6667))
00124                 return 303;
00125         if (isFTP(payload, mess_len))
00126                 return 801;
00127         if (isDNS(payload, mess_len) && (ntohs(temp->th_sport) == 53 || ntohs(temp->th_dport) == 53))
00128                 return 501;
00129         if (isYahooMess(payload, mess_len))
00130                 return 308;
00131         if (isAIM(payload, mess_len) && (ntohs(temp->th_sport) < 27000 || ntohs(temp->th_dport) < 27000))
00132                 return 301;
00133         if (isRTSP(payload, mess_len))
00134                 return 601;
00135         if (isHLDEATH(payload, mess_len))
00136                 return 416;
00137         if (isHL2DEATH(payload, mess_len))
00138                 return 407;
00139         if (isHL2CS(payload, mess_len))
00140                 return 415;
00141         if (isVALIDCERTSSL(payload, mess_len))
00142                 return 1303;
00143         if (isSSL(payload, mess_len))
00144                 return 1302;
00145         if (isSSH(payload, mess_len))
00146                 return 1301;
00147         if (isNetBios(payload, mess_len))
00148                 return 506;
00149         if (isNbns(payload, mess_len))
00150                 return 509;
00151         if (isNbds(payload, mess_len))
00152                 return 510;
00153         return IPPROTO_TCP; //Unknown application, under TCP traffic
00154     } else if ((((int) iph->ip_p) == IPPROTO_UDP)) {
00155         unsigned char *payload = getPayload(iph);
00156         u16 mess_len = getPayloadLen(iph, ipLen);
00157         struct udphdr* temp2 = (struct udphdr*) transp; 
00158         if (mess_len == 0)
00159             return 3000;        //Nonpayload UDP traffic
00160         if (isHLCS(payload, mess_len))
00161                 return 403;
00162         if (isEdku(payload, mess_len))
00163                 return 106;             //edk 22    82->106
00164         if (isBittorrentu(payload, mess_len))
00165                 return 104;             //BiTtorrent UDP 24    84->104
00166         if (isKazaau(payload, mess_len))
00167                 return 107;             //kazaa 21     81->107
00168         if (isGnuu(payload, mess_len))
00169                 return 110;             //gnu 23     83->110
00170         if (isDcu(payload, mess_len))
00171                 return 105;             //Dc 27              87->105
00172         if(isEarthu(payload, mess_len))
00173                 return 124;             //EarthStation5 28      88->124
00174         if(isMP2Pu(payload, mess_len))
00175                 return 125;             //MP2P 30       90->125
00176         if (isMSN(payload, mess_len))
00177                 return 306;
00178         if (isHTTPQuicktime(payload, mess_len))
00179                 return 602;
00180         if (isHTTPVideo(payload, mess_len))
00181                 return 606;
00182         if (isHTTPAudio(payload, mess_len))
00183                 return 608;
00184         if (isHTTP(payload, mess_len))
00185                 return 201;
00186         if (isSMTP(payload, mess_len))
00187                 return 704;
00188         if (isPOP3(payload, mess_len))
00189                 return 703;
00190         if (isIRC(payload, mess_len) && (ntohs(temp2->uh_sport) == 6667 || ntohs(temp2->uh_dport) == 6667))
00191                 return 303;
00192         if (isFTP(payload, mess_len))
00193                 return 801;
00194         if (isDNS(payload, mess_len) && (ntohs(temp2->uh_sport) == 53 || ntohs(temp2->uh_dport) == 53))
00195                 return 501;
00196         if (isYahooMess(payload, mess_len))
00197                 return 308;
00198         if (isAIM(payload, mess_len) && (ntohs(temp2->uh_sport) < 27000 && ntohs(temp2->uh_dport) < 27000))
00199                 return 301;
00200         if (isRTSP(payload, mess_len))
00201                 return 601;
00202         if (isHLDEATH(payload, mess_len))
00203                 return 416;
00204         if (isHL2DEATH(payload, mess_len))
00205                 return 407;
00206         if (isHL2CS(payload, mess_len))
00207                 return 415;
00208         if (isVALIDCERTSSL(payload, mess_len))
00209                 return 1303;
00210         if (isSSL(payload, mess_len))
00211                 return 1302;
00212         if (isSSH(payload, mess_len))
00213                 return 1301;
00214         if (isNetBios(payload, mess_len))
00215                 return 506;
00216         if (isNbns(payload, mess_len))
00217                 return 509;
00218         if (isNbds(payload, mess_len))
00219                 return 510;
00220         if (isBootstrap(payload, mess_len))
00221                 return 511;
00222         if(isSkypeToSkype(payload, mess_len))
00223                 return 1002;
00224         if(isSkypeOut(payload, mess_len))
00225                 return 1001;
00226         return IPPROTO_UDP;     //Unknown application, under UDP traffic
00227     } else if (((int) iph->ip_p) == IPPROTO_ICMP) {
00228         return IPPROTO_ICMP;    //icmp traffic
00229     }
00230     //others
00231     return 19;
00232 
00233 }

00235 //Earth
00236 u_short isEarthu(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00237 {
00238     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
00239     if (mess_len < 4)
00240         return 0;
00241     t += 2;
00242     if ((t[0] == 0xcf) && (t[1] == 64))
00243         return 1;
00244     return 0;
00245 }
00246 
00250 u_short isMP2Pu(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00251 {
00252     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
00253     if (mess_len < 5)
00254         return 0;
00255     t += 2;
00256     if ((t[0] == 0x00) && (t[1] == 00) && (t[2] == 00))
00257         return 1;
00258     return 0;
00259 }
00260 
00264 u_short isNap(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00265 {
00266     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
00267 
00268     if (mess_len < 5)
00269         return 0;
00270     t += 2;
00271     if (t[0] == 0x31)
00272         return 1;
00273     if ((t[0] == 0x00) && (t[1] == 0x00) && (t[2] == 0xca)
00274         && (t[3] == 0x00))
00275         return 1;
00276     if ((t[0] == 0xc8) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00277         return 1;
00278     if ((t[0] == 0xc9) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00279         return 1;
00280     if ((t[0] == 0xcb) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00281         return 1;
00282     if ((t[0] == 0xcc) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00283         return 1;
00284     if ((t[0] == 0x00) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00285         return 1;
00286     if ((t[0] == 0xd6) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00287         return 1;
00288     if ((t[0] == 0x02) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00289         return 1;
00290     if ((t[0] == 0x03) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00291         return 1;
00292     if ((t[0] == 0x06) && (t[1] == 0x00))
00293         return 1;
00294     if (mess_len < 6)
00295         return 0;
00296     if ((memcmp(t, "SEND", 4) == 0) || (memcmp(t, "GET", 3) == 0))
00297         return 1;               //Default TCP message 
00298     return 0;
00299 }

00305 u_short isEarthS5(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00306 {
00307     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
00308 
00309     if (mess_len < 15)
00310         return 0;
00311     if (memcmp(t, "GET /$$$$$$$$$/", 15) == 0)
00312         return 1;               //Default TCP message
00313     else
00314         return 0;
00315 }
00316 
00317 /* MP2P for TCP*/
00318 u_short isMP2P(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00319 {
00320     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
00321 
00322     if (mess_len < 4)
00323         return 0;
00324     if ((memcmp(t, "GO!!", 4) == 0) || (memcmp(t, "MD5", 4) == 0)
00325         || ((memcmp(t, "SIZ", 3) == 0) && (t[3] == 0x20))
00326         || ((memcmp(t, "STR", 3) == 0) && (t[3] == 0x20)))
00327         return 1;               //Mess padrao para TCP
00328     else
00329         return 0;
00330 }
00331 
00332 /*Search for UDP KaZaA commands*/
00333 u_short isKazaau(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00334 {
00335     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
00336     if (mess_len < 6)
00337         return 0;
00338     if (t[mess_len - 1] == 0x00) {
00339         t += (mess_len - 6);
00340         if (memcmp(t, "KaZaA", 5) == 0)
00341             return 1;
00342     }
00343 
00344     return 0;
00345 }                               /*udp_search_kazaa */
00346 
00347 /*check for gnutella get commands and other typical data*/
00348 u_short isGnu_all(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00349 {
00350 
00351     if (mess_len < 2)
00352         return 0;
00353     if ((payload[mess_len - 2] == 0x0d) && (payload[mess_len - 1] == 0x0a)) {
00354 
00355         if (mess_len < 17)
00356             return 0;
00357         if (memcmp(payload, "GNUTELLA CONNECT/", 17) == 0)
00358             return 1;
00359         if (memcmp(payload, "GNUTELLA/", 9) == 0)
00360             return 1;
00361 
00362 
00363         if ((memcmp(payload, "GET /get/", 9) == 0)
00364             || (memcmp(payload, "GET /uri-res/", 13) == 0)) {
00365             u16 c = 8;
00366             if (mess_len < 30)
00367                return 0;
00368             const u16 end = mess_len - 22;
00369             while (c < end) {
00370                 if (payload[c] == 0x0a && payload[c + 1] == 0x0d
00371                     && ((memcmp(&payload[c + 2], "X-Gnutella-", 11) == 0)
00372                         || (memcmp(&payload[c + 2], "X-Queue:", 8) == 0)))
00373                     return 1;
00374                 c++;
00375             }
00376         }
00377     }
00378     return 0;
00379 }
00380 
00381 /*intensive but slower check for all direct connect packets*/
00382 u_short isDc_all(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00383 {
00384 //    unsigned char *t = haystack;
00385 
00386     if (mess_len < 1)
00387         return 0;
00388     if (payload[0] == 0x24 && payload[mess_len - 1] == 0x7c) {
00389         const unsigned char *t = &payload[1];
00390         /* Client-Hub-Protocol */
00391         if (mess_len < 6)
00392             return 0;
00393         if (memcmp(t, "Lock ", 5) == 0)
00394             return 1;
00395         /* Client-Client-Protocol, some are already recognized by client-hub (like lock) */
00396         if (mess_len < 8)
00397             return 0;
00398         if (memcmp(t, "MyNick ", 7) == 0)
00399             return 1;
00400     }
00401     return 0;
00402 }
00403 
00404 /*Search for UDP BitTorrent commands*/
00405 u_short isBittorrentu(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00406 {
00407     switch (mess_len) {
00408     case 24:
00409         /* ^ 00 00 04 17 27 10 19 80 */
00410         if ((ntohl(get_u32(payload, 8)) == 0x00000417)
00411             && (ntohl(get_u32(payload, 12)) == 0x27101980))
00412             return 1;
00413         break;
00414     case 44:
00415 //                      if (get_u32(payload, 16) == __constant_htonl(0x00000400) && get_u32(haystack, 36) == __constant_htonl(0x00000104)) 
00416         if (get_u32(payload, 16) == htonl(0x00000400)
00417             && get_u32(payload, 36) == htonl(0x00000104))
00418             return 1;
00419 //                      if (get_u32(haystack, 16) == __constant_htonl(0x00000400))
00420         if (get_u32(payload, 16) == htonl(0x00000400))
00421             return 1;
00422         break;
00423     case 65:
00424 //                      if (get_u32(haystack, 16) == __constant_htonl(0x00000404) && get_u32(haystack, 36) == __constant_htonl(0x00000104)) 
00425         if (get_u32(payload, 16) == htonl(0x00000404)
00426             && get_u32(payload, 36) == htonl(0x00000104))
00427             return 1;
00428 //                      if (get_u32(haystack, 16) == __constant_htonl(0x00000404))
00429         if (get_u32(payload, 16) == htonl(0x00000404))
00430             return 1;
00431         break;
00432     case 67:
00433 //                      if (get_u32(haystack, 16) == __constant_htonl(0x00000406) && get_u32(haystack, 36) == __constant_htonl(0x00000104)) 
00434         if (get_u32(payload, 16) == htonl(0x00000406)
00435             && get_u32(payload, 36) == htonl(0x00000104))
00436             return 1;
00437 //                      if (get_u32(haystack, 16) == __constant_htonl(0x00000406))
00438         if (get_u32(payload, 16) == htonl(0x00000406))
00439             return 1;
00440         break;
00441     case 211:
00442 //                      if (get_u32(haystack, 8) == __constant_htonl(0x00000405)) 
00443         if (get_u32(payload, 8) == htonl(0x00000405))
00444             return 1;
00445         break;
00446     case 29:
00447 //                      if ((get_u32(haystack, 8) == __constant_htonl(0x00000401))) 
00448         if ((get_u32(payload, 8) == htonl(0x00000401)))
00449             return 1;
00450         break;
00451     case 52:
00452 //                      if (get_u32(haystack,8)  == __constant_htonl(0x00000827) &&
00453 //                      get_u32(haystack,12) == __constant_htonl(0x37502950))
00454         if (get_u32(payload, 8) == htonl(0x00000827) &&
00455             get_u32(payload, 12) == htonl(0x37502950))
00456             return 1;
00457         break;
00458     default:
00459         /* this packet does not have a constant size */
00460 //                      if (packet_len >= 40 && get_u32(haystack, 16) == __constant_htonl(0x00000402) && get_u32(haystack, 36) == __constant_htonl(0x00000104)) 
00461         if (mess_len >= 40 && get_u32(payload, 16) == htonl(0x00000402)
00462             && get_u32(payload, 36) == htonl(0x00000104))
00463             return 1;
00464         break;
00465     }
00466 
00467     /* some extra-bitcomet rules:
00468      * "d1:" [a|r] "d2:id20:"
00469      */
00470     if (mess_len > 30 && get_u8(payload, 8) == 'd'
00471         && get_u8(payload, 9) == '1' && get_u8(payload, 10) == ':') {
00472         if (get_u8(payload, 11) == 'a' || get_u8(payload, 11) == 'r') {
00473             if (memcmp(payload + 12, "d2:id20:", 8) == 0)
00474                 return 1;
00475         }
00476     }
00477 #if 0
00478     /* bitlord rules */
00479     /* packetlen must be bigger than 40 */
00480     /* first 4 bytes are zero */
00481     if (mess_len > 40 && get_u32(payload, 8) == 0x00000000) {
00482         /* first rule: 00 00 00 00 01 00 00 xx xx xx xx 00 00 00 00 */
00483         if (get_u32(payload, 12) == 0x00000000 &&
00484             get_u32(payload, 16) == 0x00010000 &&
00485             get_u32(payload, 24) == 0x00000000)
00486             return 1;
00487 
00488         /* 00 01 00 00 0d 00 00 xx xx xx xx 00 00 00 00 */
00489         if (get_u32(payload, 12) == 0x00000001 &&
00490             get_u32(payload, 16) == 0x000d0000 &&
00491             get_u32(payload, 24) == 0x00000000)
00492             return 1;
00493 
00494 
00495     }
00496 #endif
00497 
00498     return 0;
00499 }                               /*udp_search_bit */
00500 
00501 /* search for waste */
00502 u_short isWaste(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00503 {
00504     if (mess_len >= 8 && memcmp(payload, "GET.sha1:", 9) == 0)
00505         return 1;
00506 
00507     return 0;
00508 }
00509 
00510 u_short isXdcc(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00511 {
00512     /* search in small packets only */
00513     if (mess_len > 20 && mess_len < 200 && payload[mess_len - 1] == 0x0a
00514         && payload[mess_len - 2] == 0x0d
00515         && memcmp(payload, "PRIVMSG ", 8) == 0) {
00516 
00517         u16 x = 10;
00518         const u16 end = mess_len - 13;
00519 
00520         /* is seems to be a irc private massage, chedck for xdcc command */
00521         while (x < end) {
00522             if (payload[x] == ':') {
00523                 if (memcmp(&payload[x + 1], "xdcc send #", 11) == 0)
00524                     return 1;
00525             }
00526             x++;
00527         }
00528     }
00529     return 0;
00530 }
00531 
00532 u_short isKazaa_all(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00533 {
00534     if (mess_len < 2)
00535         return 0;
00536     if ((payload[mess_len - 2] == 0x0d) && (payload[mess_len - 1] == 0x0a)) {
00537 
00538         if (mess_len < 5)
00539             return 0;
00540         if (memcmp(payload, "GIVE ", 5) == 0)
00541             return 1;
00542 
00543         if (memcmp(payload, "GET /", 5) == 0) {
00544             u16 c = 8;
00545             if (mess_len < 35)
00546                 return 0;
00547             const u16 end = mess_len - 22;
00548             while (c < end) {
00549                 if (payload[c] == 0x0a && payload[c + 1] == 0x0d
00550                     &&
00551                     ((memcmp(&payload[c + 2], "X-Kazaa-Username: ", 18) ==
00552                       0)
00553                      ||
00554                      (memcmp
00555                       (&payload[c + 2], "User-Agent: PeerEnabler/",
00556                        24) == 0)))
00557                     return 1;
00558                 c++;
00559             }
00560         }
00561     }
00562     return 0;
00563 }
00564 
00565 u_short isMute(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00566 {
00567     if (mess_len == 209 || mess_len == 345 || mess_len == 473
00568         || mess_len == 609 || mess_len == 1121) {
00569         //printk(KERN_DEBUG "size hit: %u",size);
00570         if (memcmp(payload, "PublicKey: ", 11) == 0) {
00571             return 1;
00572 
00573 /*                      if (memcmp(t+size-14,"\x0aEndPublicKey\x0a",14) == 0)
00574                         {
00575                                 printk(KERN_DEBUG "end pubic key hit: %u",size);
00576                                 
00577                         }*/
00578         }
00579     }
00580     return 0;
00581 }
00582 
00583 u_short isWinMX(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00584 {
00585     if (((mess_len) == 4) && (memcmp(payload, "SEND", 4) == 0))
00586         return 1;
00587     if (((mess_len) == 3) && (memcmp(payload, "GET", 3) == 0))
00588         return 1;
00589     if (mess_len < 10)
00590         return 0;
00591 
00592     if ((memcmp(payload, "SEND", 4) == 0)
00593         || (memcmp(payload, "GET", 3) == 0)) {
00594         u16 c = 4;
00595         const u16 end = mess_len - 2;
00596         u8 count = 0;
00597         while (c < end) {
00598             if (payload[c] == 0x20 && payload[c + 1] == 0x22) {
00599                 c++;
00600                 count++;
00601                 if (count >= 2)
00602                     return 1;
00603             }
00604             c++;
00605         }
00606     }
00607 
00608     if (mess_len == 149 && payload[0] == '8') {
00609         if (get_u32(payload, 17) == 0 && get_u32(payload, 21) == 0
00610             && get_u32(payload, 25) == 0 &&
00611             //get_u16(payload,39) == 0 && get_u16(payload,135) == __constant_htons(0x7edf) && get_u16(payload,147) == __constant_htons(0xf792))
00612             get_u16(payload, 39) == 0
00613             && get_u16(payload, 135) == htons(0x7edf)
00614             && get_u16(payload, 147) == htons(0xf792)) {
00615             return 1;
00616         }
00617     }
00618     return 0;
00619 }                               /*search_winmx */
00620 
00621 
00622 u_short isKazaa(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00623 {
00624      if (mess_len < 11)
00625         return 0;
00626      if ((payload[mess_len-2] == 0x0d) && (payload[mess_len-1] == 0x0a) && memcmp(payload, "GET /.hash=", 11) == 0)
00627         return 1;
00628 /*    if (mess_len < 11)
00629         return 0;
00630     if ((payload[mess_len - 2] == 0x0d) && (payload[mess_len - 1] == 0x0a)
00631         && memcmp(payload, "GET /.hash=", 11) == 0)
00632         return 1;
00633 */
00634     return 0;
00635 }
00636 
00637 u_short isBittorrent(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00638 {
00639     if (mess_len > 20) {
00640         /* test for match 0x13+"BitTorrent protocol" */
00641         if (payload[0] == 0x13) {
00642             if (memcmp(payload + 1, "BitTorrent protocol", 19) == 0)
00643                 return 1;
00644         }
00645 
00646         /* get tracker commandos, all starts with GET /
00647          * then it can follow: scrape| announce
00648          * and then ?hash_info=
00649          *//*if(ntohs(temp->th_sport) == 443 || ntohs(temp->th_dport) == 443 || ntohs(temp->th_sport) == 22 || ntohs(temp->th_dport) == 22) {
00650                 char *strg = (char*)malloc((mess_len+1)*sizeof(char));
00651                 coupeEOF(payload, mess_len, strg);
00652                 char ipf[16];
00653                 char ipd[16];
00654                 strcpy(ipf, inet_ntoa(iph->ip_src));
00655                 strcpy(ipd, inet_ntoa(iph->ip_dst));
00656                 a = fopen("msgs.txt", "a+");
00657                 fprintf(a, "src = %s   dest = %s\n", ipf, ipd);
00658                 fprintf(a, "srcport = %d   dstport = %d\n", ntohs(temp->th_sport), ntohs(temp->th_dport));
00659                 fprintf(a, "msg = %s\n", payload);
00660                 fprintf(a, "msgCoupe = %s\n\n", payload);
00661                 fclose(a);
00662                 free(strg);
00663                 //return 306;
00664         }*/
00665         if (memcmp(payload, "GET /", 5) == 0) {
00666             /* message scrape */
00667             if (mess_len < 22)
00668               return 0;
00669             if (memcmp(payload + 5, "scrape?info_hash=", 17) == 0)
00670                 return 1;
00671             if (mess_len < 24)
00672               return 0;
00673             /* message announce */
00674             if (memcmp(payload + 5, "announce?info_hash=", 19) == 0)
00675                 return 1;
00676         }
00677     } else {
00678         /* bitcomet encryptes the first packet, so we have to detect another 
00679          * one later in the flow */
00680         /* first try failed, too many missdetections */
00681         //if ( size == 5 && get_u32(t,0) == __constant_htonl(1) && t[4] < 3) return (IPP2P_BIT * 100 + 3);
00682 
00683         /* second try: block request packets */
00684 //              if ( mess_len == 17 && get_u32(payload,0) == __constant_htonl(0x0d) && payload[4] == 0x06 && get_u32(payload,13) == __constant_htonl(0x4000) ) return 1;
00685         if (mess_len == 17 && get_u32(payload, 0) == htonl(0x0d)
00686             && payload[4] == 0x06 && get_u32(payload, 13) == htonl(0x4000))
00687             return 1;
00688     }
00689 
00690     return 0;
00691 }
00692 
00693 /*intensive but slower check for all direct connect packets*/
00694 u_short isDc(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00695 {
00696     if (mess_len < 1)
00697         return 0;
00698     if (payload[0] != 0x24)
00699         return 0;
00700     else {
00701         if (mess_len < 6)
00702             return 0;
00703         if (memcmp(&payload[1], "Send|", 5) == 0)
00704             return 1;
00705         else
00706             return 0;
00707     }
00708 }
00709 
00710 /*Search for appleJuice commands*/
00711 u_short isApple(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00712 {
00713     if ((mess_len > 7) && (payload[6] == 0x0d) && (payload[7] == 0x0a)
00714         && (memcmp(payload, "ajprot", 6) == 0))
00715         return 1;
00716 
00717     return 0;
00718 }
00719 
00720 /*fast check for edonkey file segment transfer command*/
00721 u_short isEdk(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00722 {
00723     if (mess_len < 1)
00724         return 0;
00725     if (payload[0] != 0xe3)
00726         return 0;
00727     else {
00728         if (mess_len < 5)
00729             return 0;
00730         if (payload[5] == 0x47)
00731             return 1;
00732         else
00733             return 0;
00734     }
00735 }
00736 
00737 /*intensive but slower search for some edonkey packets including size-check*/
00738 u_short isEdk_all(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00739 {
00740     if (mess_len < 1)
00741         return 0;
00742     if (payload[0] != 0xe3)
00743         return 0;
00744     else {
00745         //t += head_len;
00746         if (mess_len < 5)
00747             return 0;
00748         const u16 cmd = get_u16(payload, 1);
00749         if (cmd == (mess_len - 5)) {
00750             switch (payload[5]) {
00751             case 0x01:
00752                 return 1;       /*Client: hello or Server:hello */
00753             case 0x4c:
00754                 return 1;       /*Client: Hello-Answer */
00755             }
00756         }
00757         return 0;
00758     }
00759 }
00760 
00761 u_short isGnu(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00762 {
00763     if (mess_len < 9)
00764         return 0;
00765     if ((payload[mess_len - 2] == 0x0d) && (payload[mess_len - 1] == 0x0a)) {
00766         if (memcmp(payload, "GET /get/", 9) == 0)
00767             return 1;
00768         if (mess_len < 13)
00769             return 0;
00770         if (memcmp(payload, "GET /uri-res/", 13) == 0)
00771             return 1;
00772     }
00773     return 0;
00774 }
00775 
00776 /*Search for SoulSeek commands*/
00777 u_short isSoul(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00778 {
00779     /* match: xx xx xx xx | xx = sizeof(payload) - 4 */
00780     if (mess_len < 9 ) return 0;
00781     if (get_u32(payload, 0) == (mess_len - 4)) {
00782         const __u32 m = get_u32(payload, 4);
00783         /* match 00 yy yy 00, yy can be everything */
00784         if (get_u8(payload, 4) == 0x00 && get_u8(payload, 7) == 0x00) {
00785             return 1;
00786         }
00787         /* next match: 01 yy 00 00 | yy can be everything */
00788         if (get_u8(payload, 4) == 0x01 && get_u16(payload, 6) == 0x0000) {
00789             return 1;
00790         }
00791 
00792         /* other soulseek commandos are: 1-5,7,9,13-18,22,23,26,28,35-37,40-46,50,51,60,62-69,91,92,1001 */
00793         /* try to do this in an intelligent way */
00794         /* get all small commandos */
00795         switch (m) {
00796         case 7:
00797         case 9:
00798         case 22:
00799         case 23:
00800         case 26:
00801         case 28:
00802         case 50:
00803         case 51:
00804         case 60:
00805         case 91:
00806         case 92:
00807         case 1001:
00808             return 1;
00809         }
00810 
00811         if (m > 0 && m < 6) {
00812             return 1;
00813         }
00814         if (m > 12 && m < 19) {
00815             return 1;
00816         }
00817 
00818         if (m > 34 && m < 38) {
00819             return 1;
00820         }
00821 
00822         if (m > 39 && m < 47) {
00823             return 1;
00824         }
00825 
00826         if (m > 61 && m < 70) {
00827             return 1;
00828         }
00829 
00830     }
00831 
00832     /* match 14 00 00 00 01 yy 00 00 00 STRING(YY) 01 00 00 00 00 46|50 00 00 00 00 */
00833     /* without size at the beginning !!! */
00834     if (get_u32(payload, 0) == 0x14 && get_u8(payload, 4) == 0x01) {
00835         __u32 y = get_u32(payload, 5);
00836         /* we need 19 chars + string */
00837         if ((y + 19) <= (mess_len)) {
00838             const unsigned char *w = payload + 9 + y;
00839             if (get_u32(w, 0) == 0x01
00840                 && (get_u16(w, 4) == 0x4600 || get_u16(w, 4) == 0x5000)
00841                 && get_u32(w, 6) == 0x00);
00842             return 1;
00843         }
00844     }
00845     return 0;
00846 }
00847 
00848 
00849 /*Ares for TCP*/
00850 u_short isAres(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00851 {
00852     /* all ares packets start with  */
00853     if (mess_len < 6 ) return 0;
00854     if (payload[1] == 0 && (mess_len - payload[0]) == 3) {
00855         switch (payload[2]) {
00856         case 0x5a:
00857             /* ares connect */
00858             if (mess_len == 6 && payload[5] == 0x05)
00859                 return 1;
00860             break;
00861         case 0x09:
00862             /* ares search, min 3 chars --> 14 bytes
00863              * lets define a search can be up to 30 chars --> max 34 bytes
00864              */
00865             if (mess_len >= 14 && mess_len <= 34)
00866                 return 1;
00867             break;
00868         }
00869     }
00870 
00871     return 0;
00872 }
00873 
00874 
00875 
00876 
00880 u_short isEdku(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00881 {
00882     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
00883 
00884     if (mess_len < 10)
00885         return 0;
00886     t += 8;
00887     switch (t[0]) {
00888     case 0xe3:
00889         {                       /*edonkey */
00890             switch (t[1]) {
00891                 /* client -> server status request */
00892             case 0x96:
00893                 if (mess_len == 14)
00894                     return 1;
00895                 break;
00896                 /* server -> client status request */
00897             case 0x97:
00898                 if (mess_len == 42)
00899                     return 1;
00900                 break;
00901                 /* server description request */
00902                 /* e3 2a ff f0 .. | size == 6 */
00903 //                                      case 0xa2: if ( (mess_len == 14) && ( get_u16(t,2) == __constant_htons(0xfff0) ) ) return 1;
00904             case 0xa2:
00905                 if ((mess_len == 14) && (get_u16(t, 2) == htons(0xfff0)))
00906                     return 1;
00907                 break;
00908                 /* server description response */
00909                 /* e3 a3 ff f0 ..  | size > 40 && size < 200 */
00910                 //case 0xa3: return ((IPP2P_EDK * 100) + 53);
00911                 //      break;
00912             case 0x9a:
00913                 if (mess_len == 26)
00914                     return 1;
00915                 break;
00916 
00917             case 0x92:
00918                 if (mess_len == 18)
00919                     return 1;
00920                 break;
00921             }
00922             break;
00923         }
00924     case 0xe4:
00925         {
00926             switch (t[1]) {
00927                 /* e4 20 .. | size == 43 */
00928             case 0x20:
00929                 if ((mess_len == 43) && (t[2] != 0x00) && (t[34] != 0x00))
00930                     return 1;
00931                 break;
00932                 /* e4 00 .. 00 | size == 35 ? */
00933             case 0x00:
00934                 if ((mess_len == 35) && (t[26] == 0x00))
00935                     return 1;
00936                 break;
00937                 /* e4 10 .. 00 | size == 35 ? */
00938             case 0x10:
00939                 if ((mess_len == 35) && (t[26] == 0x00))
00940                     return 1;
00941                 break;
00942                 /* e4 18 .. 00 | size == 35 ? */
00943             case 0x18:
00944                 if ((mess_len == 35) && (t[26] == 0x00))
00945                     return 1;
00946                 break;
00947                 /* e4 52 .. | size = 44 */
00948             case 0x52:
00949                 if (mess_len == 44)
00950                     return 1;
00951                 break;
00952                 /* e4 58 .. | size == 6 */
00953             case 0x58:
00954                 if (mess_len == 14)
00955                     return 1;
00956                 break;
00957                 /* e4 59 .. | size == 2 */
00958             case 0x59:
00959                 if (mess_len == 10)
00960                     return 1;
00961                 break;
00962                 /* e4 28 .. | mess_len == 52,77,102,127... */
00963             case 0x28:
00964                 if (((mess_len - 52) % 25) == 0)
00965                     return 1;
00966                 break;
00967                 /* e4 50 xx xx | size == 4 */
00968             case 0x50:
00969                 if (mess_len == 12)
00970                     return 1;
00971                 break;
00972                 /* e4 40 xx xx | size == 48 */
00973             case 0x40:
00974                 if (mess_len == 56)
00975                     return 1;
00976                 break;
00977             }
00978             break;
00979         }
00980     }                           /* end of switch (t[0]) */
00981     return 0;
00982 }                               /*udp_search_edk */
00983 
00984 
00985 //Gnutella
00986 u_short isGnuu(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
00987 {
00988     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
00989 
00990     if (mess_len < 11)
00991         return 0;
00992     t += 8;
00993     if (memcmp(t, "GND", 3) == 0)
00994         return 1;
00995     if (mess_len < 18)
00996         return 0;
00997     if (memcmp(t, "GNUTELLA ", 9) == 0)
00998         return 1;
00999     return 0;
01000 }
01001 
01002 //DirectConnect UDP
01003 u_short isDcu(const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len)
01004 {
01005     unsigned char *t = (unsigned char *) payload;
01006     if (mess_len < 9)
01007         return 0;
01008     if ((*(t + 8) == 0x24) && (*(t + mess_len - 1) == 0x7c)) {
01009         t += 8;
01010         if (mess_len < 11)
01011             return 0;
01012         if (memcmp(t, "SR ", 3) == 0)
01013             return 1;
01014         if (mess_len < 13)
01015             return 0;
01016         if (memcmp(t, "Ping ", 5) == 0)
01017             return 1;
01018     }
01019     return 0;
01020 }
01021 
01022 u_short isHTTP (const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len) {
01023         char *strg = (char*)malloc((mess_len+1)*sizeof(char));
01024         coupeEOF(payload, mess_len, strg);
01025         
01026         if ((regexec(http, strg, 0, NULL, 0)==0)) {
01027                 free(strg);
01028                 return 1;
01029         }
01030         if (regexec(http2, strg, 0, NULL, 0)==0) {
01031                 free(strg);
01032                 return 1;
01033         }
01034         free(strg);
01035         return 0;
01036 }

01212 
01213 u_short isFTP (const unsigned char *payload, const u16 mess_len) {
01214         char *strg = (char*)malloc((mess_len+1)*sizeof(char));
01215         coupeEOF(payload, mess_len, strg);
01216         
01217         if (regexec(ftp, strg, 0, NULL, 0)==0) {
01218                 free(strg);
01219                 return 1;
01220         }
01221         free(strg);
01222         return 0;
01223 }
01224

01226         
01227         char *strg = (char*)malloc((mess_len+1)*sizeof(char));
01228         coupeEOF(payload, mess_len, strg);
01229         if (regexec(skypeOut, strg, 0, NULL, 0)==0) {
01230                 free(strg);
01231                 return 1;
01232         }
01233         free(strg);
01234         return 0;
01235 }

01326 u_short isAP2PID(u_short id) {
01327         if( (id>100) && (id<201) ) 
01328                 return 1;
01329         return 0;
01330 }
01331 
01332 u_short verID(u_short old_id, u_short new_id) {
01333         if(old_id == PROTO_ID_NONPAYLOAD) {//We can't classify a flow with NONPAYLOAD type only because his first packet
01334                 return new_id;
01335         }
01336         else if( (old_id < DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER) ) {
01337                 if( (new_id>= DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER) && (new_id<PROTO_ID_NONPAYLOAD) ) {
01338                         return new_id;
01339                 }
01340         } else if ( isSuperClass(old_id) ) { 
01341                 if( (new_id>=DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER) && ( (new_id<PROTO_ID_NONPAYLOAD) ) )
01342                         return new_id;
01343         } else if ( (old_id>UP_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER)&&(old_id<PROTO_ID_NONPAYLOAD) ){
01344                 if( (new_id<=UP_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER) && (new_id>=DOWN_BASE_P2P_CLASS_NUMBER) )
01345                         return new_id;
01346         }
01347         return old_id;
01348 }
01349 u_short isSuperClass(u_short id) {
01350         if( (id==SSL_SUPER_CLASS_NUMBER) || (id==HTTP_SUPER_CLASS_NUMBER) ) 
01351                 return 1;
01352         return 0;
01353 }
GPRT
Federal University of Pernambuco
Networking and Telecommunications Research Group - GPRT
